name: Monochromattack
description:
One color, One bullet, One life.

MONOCHROMATTACK is the top-down arena shooter where you are the bullet.
Dodge the enemies and use the charging-platforms to launch yourself back at them.
Every enemy destroyed this way increases your score.

How long will you survive?

MONOCHROMATTACK was created for the GMTKJam 2019 by Bastian & Fabian Fuchs.

How to Play:

Press WASD-Keys to move around, Press the space bar  for short burst of speed and invulnerability. Avoid the enemies at all costs!

Enter a charging-platform to strike back. Use the mouse to aim your shot while charging.

Every second you survive and every enemy you defeat will increase your score.

Credits:

Music: Ville Nousiainen, XCVG, Phillip Miller

SFX: Little Robot Sound Factory, Universal Sound FX
